evidence.source_document: Complaint For Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: 1. Declaring that the termination of SEVIS status for Plaintiffs and all similarly situated F-1 visa holders—who have not been convicted of any criminal offense, have maintained academic standing, and are otherwise in compliance with the terms of their visa—was unlawful, and that their SEVIS records and F-1 status shall be restored immediately;

extracted.value: Declaratory relief; restoration of SEVIS status

evidence.source_document: Complaint For Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: 2. Preliminarily and permanently enjoining Defendants from further SEVIS terminations without lawful process;

extracted.value: Injunctive relief; preliminary and permanent injunction against further SEVIS terminations

evidence.source_document: Complaint For Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: 3. Awarding costs and attorneys’ fees pursuant to the Equal Access to Justice Act, 28 U.S.C. § 2412(b);

evidence.source_document: Complaint For Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: 4. Granting such other and further relief as the Court deems just and proper.

extracted.value: Other relief as the Court deems just and proper

evidence.source_document: First Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: 5. Granting such other and further relief as the Court deems just and proper.

extracted.value: Granting such other and further relief as the Court deems just and proper

evidence.source_document: Complaint For Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Defendants’ termination of Plaintiffs’ SEVIS records constitutes final agency action reviewable under the Administrative Procedure Act, 5 U.S.C. §§ 701–706.

evidence.source_document: Complaint For Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs are entitled to relief under 5 U.S.C. § 706(2)(A), which requires this Court to set aside unlawful and arbitrary agency action.

evidence.source_document: Complaint For Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs are entitled to relief under 5 U.S.C. § 706(2)(B).

evidence.source_document: Complaint For Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
